short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Controller Browser Extension, Enable/Disable and other features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here's what sets Extensity Ultra apart:

Effortless Enable/Disable: Manage all your extensions with a single click. Quickly activate the ones you need for specific tasks and seamlessly deactivate others to eliminate performance drain and conflicts.

Advanced Grouping: Organize your extensions into intuitive groups based on category, function, or personal preference. Easily enable or disable entire groups with a single click, maximizing your efficiency.

Custom Whitelists and Blacklists: Fine-tune control by creating whitelists of websites where certain extensions should always be active and blacklists where they should remain disabled.

Powerful Search and Filtering: Find the extension you need instantly with a built-in search bar and filter by name, category, or current status.

Detailed Insights: Gain valuable insights into your extensions' activity, including resource usage and potential conflicts. Make informed decisions about which ones to keep and which ones to remove.

Flexible Scheduling: Automate extension management by setting schedules for specific extensions to activate or deactivate based on time, website, or activity.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes managing your extensions effortless.

Download Extensity Ultra today and take control of your extensions!

Contact Email - ctechhindi@gmail.com
